content: 1 side st magic cast on turkish cast on be worked over sts on needle 2 remaining on ws of heel do or figure 8 cast on wrap loosely on purl side not turn work at end of last row instructions for judy s magic row 1 rs k31 34 37 m1 you will have 28 31 34 sts on cast on can be found at k1 w&t needle 2 knitty com or do a google row 2 ws p18 20 22 m1p k all sts on needle 1 on needle search for judy s magic cast p1 w&t 2 k2tog k to end of round 54 on row 3 rs k16 18 20 m1 60 66 sts after casting on k first round as k1 w&t indicated in the cast-on row 4 ws p14 16 18 m1p leg instructions p1 w&t k all sts until work is 1 5 inches round a k1 k f&b k until 2 sts row 5 rs k12 14 16 m1 less than desired length rem on needle 1 k f&b k1 k1 k1 w&t next round k2 p1 to end k f&b k until 2 sts rem on row 6 ws p10 12 14 m1p repeat this round until work is needle 2 k f&b k1 4 sts p1 w&t desired length bobble all sts using increased row 7 rs k8 10 12 m1 k1 jeny s surprisingly stretchy round b k all sts on both w&t bind-off on knitty com or do a needles row 8 ws p6 8 10 m1p google search or your favourite repeat these 2 rounds until you p1 w&t needle 2 now contains stretchy or loose bind-off have 54 60 66 sts 27 30 33 57 60 63 sts sts on each needle on the rs k to the end of finishing needle 2 picking up each wrap weave in ends soak at least 1 foot as you encounter it and knitting hour and block on appropriately- work in stockinette st until work it together with the stitch that it sized sock blockers measures approx 2 75 3 3 25 had wrapped k across all sts of inches less than length of foot needle 1 proceed to gusset heel flap gusset on needle 2 picking up each gusset increases will be worked wrap as you encounter it and only on needle 2 knitting it together with the gusset round 1 k all sts on stitch that it had wrapped k43 needle 1 on needle 2 k1 k 45 47 sts ssk turn work do f&b k until 2 sts rem on needle not wrap stitch 2 k f&b k1 2 sts increased next row ws sl 1 p27 29 gusset round 2 k all sts 31 p2tog turn work repeat these 2 rounds until you next row rs *sl 1 k1 repeat have a total of 49 52 55 sts on from * 14 15 16 times ssk pattern and all images are
